World predictor

Feb 5, 2017

The wisdom of the crowd is the idea that a large group of people can make better predictions than a single expert. Collecting a huge number of answers allows you to even out the inevitable noise and emotional investment that comes with a single answer.

This approach has proven to work in the past with prediction markets like Intrade. World Predictor is a simplified version of this: choosing one event equates “buying” one event and “selling” the other. The probability of an event is calculated using Hanson’s logarithmic market scoring rule (LMSR) which simulates the probability (or price) an event would have if it was traded on a market.

This project was developed as an Android app using Java. The app can be found here.
